tool_description: Selects optimal voice synthesis models based on requirements including quality, speed, language support, and voice characteristics.

voice_characteristics.description: Desired voice features: expressive, neural, robotic, natural

error_messages: Invalid quality priority: Use high, medium, or fast.
Unsupported language: One or more language codes are not supported.
Invalid voice characteristics: Use supported characteristics from available options.
Invalid computational budget: Use low, medium, or high.
No suitable model: No model meets all specified requirements.
usage: Specify quality priority and required languages, optionally add voice characteristics and computational constraints for model recommendation.
